title: IlegalStateException: No outbox_state entry for message with id 1
creator: josh24
content:
Hello, on my android phone I have recently been getting this message pop up. I'm not sure why I'm getting this or how to fix it. Does anyone know what to do about this?

IlegalStateException: No outbox_state entry for message with id 1

Thank you for your help!
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/141.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;os:Android phone

title: Thunderbird android "insufficient system storage"
creator: james81
content: Today I am not able to send emails on my phone. Even a simple test msg is met with an alert and an email in the outbox. I have restarted the phone, and also cleared Thunderbird app cache and forced stop. I still get it. I sent emails last night no problem. I am able to send emails using domain webmail and desktop Thunderbird application. This is only on mobile android version 14. Thunderbird 11.1
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/141.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36
